Package felixcaban.data

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • felixcaban.data.DataManager
  • public final class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for providing the initial data when the application launches. Provides additional static members for testing and maintaining data integrity throughout the application life cycle.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    felix.caban

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataManager

        public DataManager()

    • Method Detail

      • LoadDataOnStart

        public static void LoadDataOnStart()
        Instantiates multiple Part and Product objects upon program start for testing the application. Also sets the seeds for auto-generating the PartId and ProductId.

      • incrementPartId

        public static void incrementPartId()
        Increments the partId for the next Part that is added. Is triggered once the AddPartForm saves a new Part.

      • incrementProductId

        public static void incrementProductId()
        Increments the productId for the next Product that is added. Is triggered once the AddProductForm saves a new Product.

      • getNextPartId

        public static int getNextPartId()
        Gets the next auto-generated PartId. Provides it to the AddPartForm when a new Part is created.
        Returns:
        the auto-generated PartId for the next Part object instantiated.

      • getNextProductId

        public static int getNextProductId()
        Gets the next auto-generated ProductId. Provides it to the AddProductForm when a new Product is created.
        Returns:
        the auto-generated ProductId for the next Product object instantiated.

      • setPartToModify

        public static void setPartToModify​(int index,
                                   Part part)
        Sets the Part that is currently being modified. It will be used to populate the ModifyPartForm.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Part that is currently being modified.
        part - the Part that is currently being modified.

      • setProductToModify

        public static void setProductToModify​(int index,
                                      Product product)
        Sets the Product that is currently being modified. It will be used to populate the ModifyProductForm.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Part that is currently being modified.
        product - the Part that is currently being modified.

      • getPartToModify

        public static Part getPartToModify()
        Gets the Part that is currently being modified. Used to populate the ModifyPartForm.
        Returns:
        the Part that is currently being modified.

      • getPartIndexToModify

        public static int getPartIndexToModify()
        Gets the index of the Part that is currently being modified. Used to populate the ModifyPartForm.
        Returns:
        the index of the Part that is currently being modified.

      • getProductToModify

        public static Product getProductToModify()
        Gets the Product that is currently being modified. Used to populate the ModifyProductForm.
        Returns:
        the Part that is currently being modified.

      • getProductIndexToModify

        public static int getProductIndexToModify()
        Gets the index of the Product that is currently being modified. Used to populate the ModifyProductForm.
        Returns:
        the index of the Part that is currently being modified.

      • isInteger

        public static boolean isInteger​(java.lang.String input)
        Tests if a string is an integer. Returns true if string is an integer, false if it is not.
        Parameters:
        input - string to test.
        Returns:
        true if string is an integer, false if it is not.

      • isDouble

        public static boolean isDouble​(java.lang.String input)
        Tests if a string is an double. Returns true if string is a double, false if it is not.
        Parameters:
        input - string to test.
        Returns:
        true if string is a double, false if it is not.

      • partExists

        public static boolean partExists​(int i)
        Tests if a Part exists in inventory. Returns true if i is a valid PartId, false if it is not.
        Parameters:
        i - the integer to test to determine if it is a valid PartId.
        Returns:
        true if integer is a valid PartId, false if it is not.

      • productExists

        public static boolean productExists​(int i)
        Tests if a Product exists in inventory. Returns true if i is a valid ProductId, false if it is not.
        Parameters:
        i - the integer to test to determine if it is a valid ProductId.
        Returns:
        true if integer is a valid ProductId, false if it is not.
